mapper.select: select region_no as regionNo, region_country as regionCountry, region_city as regionCity, filename from region where region_country like '%'||#{_parameter}||'%' or region_city like '%'||#{_parameter}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into together_board values( together_board_seq.nextval, #{togetherTitle}, #{togetherContent}, #{togetherWriter}, #{regionNo}, 0, sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from ( select t.*, rownum as rnum from( select together_no as togetherNo, together_title as togetherTitle, together_content as togetherContent, together_writer as togetherWriter, region_country as regionCountry, region_city as regionCity, to_char(together_date,'hh24:mi') as writeTime, to_char(together_date,'yyyy. mm. dd.') as togetherDate from together_board join region using(region_no) order by together_no) t ) where rnum between #{start} and #{end} order by rnum desc

select together_no as togetherNo, together_title as togetherTitle, together_content as togetherContent, together_writer as togetherWriter, region_country as regionCountry, region_city as regionCity, region_no as regionNo, to_char(together_date,'hh24:mi') as writeTime, to_char(together_date,'yyyy. mm. dd.') as togetherDate, (select count(*) from board_comment where board_class = 3 and board_no = #{_parameter}) as commentCount from together_board join region using(region_no) where together_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment values( comment_seq.nextval, 0, 3, #{boardNo}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentContent}, null, sysdate )
mapper.select: select comment_no as commentNo, member_nickname as commentWriter, comment_content as commentContent, to_char(comment_date,'hh24:mi') as commentTime, to_char(comment_date,'yyyy. mm. dd.') as commentDate from board_comment join member on(comment_writer = member_nickname) where board_class = 3 and board_no = #{_parameter}
